line: listen i’m gonna be moving out so you will be in charge of paying the rent
no just the months you actually want to live here
okay here is the phone bill
now look i know i kinda sprung this whole me moving out on thing so why don’t i just why don’t i just cover you for a while
joey tribbiani does not take charity anymore
okay i mean thanks but i’m done taking money from you
all right i can take of myself
okay uh here’s the electric bill
this is how much we pay for electric
so we’ll do the rest of the bills later then
so is joey going to have to give up the apartment
i tried to offer him some money but he wouldn’t take it
well how much do you think he needs
i figure that 1 500 would cover him for a few months y’know
but i have to trick him into taking it so i won’t hurt his pride
why don’t you hire him as an actor
you could have him dress up and put on little skits
well that would help the pride thing
wanna move in with me tomorrow
so what do you girls have planned for tonight
well instead of being sad that tonight is my last night together with rachel we thought we’d go out to dinner and celebrate the fact that rachel is moving in with phoebe
what a mean thing to say
i would never tell you it’s not your birthday
so you guys have anything planned for the big last night
well instead of just hanging out we figure we’d do nothing
whoa whoa whoa knicks season opener tonight
i thought maybe you guys would come over and watch it
i don’t know ross not if you’re gonna talk about how you gave up a career in basketball to become a paleontologist
i did give up a career in basketball to become a paleontologist
we’re supposed to start having fun in 15 minutes
well and clearly not a minute sooner
rachel you are packed though right i mean please tell me that you’re packed
i just wanted to ask phoebe her opinion on what i should wear tonight
my god i can’t get a minute of peace around this place
well what you’re wearing is fine for that
rachel i need to borrow you’re not packed
you’re not packed even a little bit
no no don’t get mad because look this is what happened
so i i started packing then i realized what am i doing
so as a gift to you on our last night ta da
i’m so sorry i didn’t get you anything
okay look everybody has to help
you can help can’t you phoebe
all right chandler can make boxes ross can wrap and joey can lift things
now phoebe go tell the guys they have to help out
now it’s too late for me but save your selves
the movers will be here in 11 hours
oh nope i i have plans with joey
i thought you said you were going to do nothing
yes but for the last time
oh but but i can’t do it
it’s almost 8 o’clock it’s almost past his bedtime
because i can see right into your apartment
what do you think i’d just use my son as as an excuse
what kind of father do you think i am
i gotta go make a fake ben
our last pizzas together as roommates
oh i wish i’d know you were going to do that i ordered chinese
hey actually in a way it’s kinda nice
me bringing the food of my ancestors you the food of yours
say joe i had a strange idea of what we could do for our last night
what do you say we play a little uh foosball for money
you haven’t beaten me once since my injury plagued ’97 season
it would be easier if you just give me your money
ohhhhhh look it’s the roller blades
you remember when we got these
you guys we said we were gonna have fun
come on hey remember the time you don’t remember
i’m sorry pheebs i guess i’m just really said that i’m leaving
i’m gonna miss you so much
well this doesn’t have to be so sad though
maybe instead of just thinking about how much you’re gonna miss each other you should like think of the things you’re not gonna miss
come on there’s gotta be something
uh well i guess i’m not gonna miss the fact that you’re never allowed to move the phone pen
does rachel move the phone pen
yeah well i don’t think it really counts if you have to read them off the back of your hand after you fall asleep on the couch
so so you missed a message from who
that’s like 500 bucks you owe me
500 that is a loooot of electricity
okay give me a chance to win my money back
okay get ready to owe me
now that’s why only the little fake men are supposed to do all the kicking
oh i’m just over here with ben
ben say hi to aunt monica
oh i guess he doesn’t feel like talking right now
yeah i think it was better when you guys were sad
hey uh remember the roller blades
you know what else i’m not gonna miss
i wash the toilet 17 times a day
even if people are on it
hi i’m rachel is my sweater too tight
oh i’d better wash it and shrink it
i’m monica i don’t get phone messages from interesting people
oh my god i love ross
oh my god i can’t find a boyfriend
so i guess i’ll just stumble across the hall and sleep with the first guy i find in there
yeah we should get a move on if we wanna make those dinner reservations
the last night you’re here and i lose the two most important things in my life the foosball table and 500
well there are other ways of winning back your money how about a little uh a little blackjack
okay uh how about how about y’know what
we could play a new game
i don’t know how to play cups
come on come on it’s really easy and really really fun
i have two queens what do you have
well one of you has to take the first step
and it should be you because she’s the one who’s leaving
well maybe you’re right she made fun of my phone pen
i know i took it hard too
listen rachel i feel really bad about what are you doing
it needs to go about 20 blocks to the left
you’re the one who wants to make this big change and move in with chandler
you should be the one to go
why should i have to leave
hey how are you guys doing
then how come all your stuff is in this box
you guys i think i know what’s going on here
i know that i know that you’re acting mad because you think that it’ll make it easier to leave
but deep down you’re still really sad
it doesn’t matter because nothing beats a three and a six
that my friend is d cup
okay now much have you won so far
well you see in cups once you get 700 you have to double it
hey i didn’t make up the rules
now after you receive the doubling bonus you get uh one card
now that one card could be worth 100 bringing your total to 1 500
don’t get to excited because that’s not gonna happen unless you get no way
well this is the last box of your clothes
i’m just gonna label it what were you thinking
funny because i was just gonna go across the hall and write that on chandler
hey you guys i don’t mean to make things worse but umm i don’t want to live with rachel anymore
you’re just so mean to each other
and i don’t want to end up like that with rachel
well phoebe that’s fine because i’m not moving
whoa whoa whoa phoebe you gotta take her
y’know i i i said some really bad stuff about her but y’know rachel has some good qualities that make her a good roommate
y’know she has 147 000 pairs of boots
yeah and you stretch ‘em out with your big old clown feet
she gets tons of catalogs and umm she’ll fold down the pages of the things she thinks that i’d like
when i take a shower she leaves me little notes on the mirror
i like having things to read in the bathroom
when i fall asleep on the couch after reading she covers me over with a blanket
well y’know i don’t want you to be cold
and when i told her that i was gonna be moving in with chandler she was really supportive
and now you have to leave
and i have to live with a boy
okay rachel i can’t wait to live with you
and you know what we should do
bring monica and then we could all live there together
but honey i think she’s moving in with chandler
hey mon how’s the packing going
yeah he’s right oh my god
get your head of your shirt there son
ross and i were helping the girls pack took a little break i lost 1 500 to him in cups
wh how did you lose at cups
i started out with a king and a queen bamn
then i get a jack and a king boom
ross was getting the cup card the d cup the sittin’ down bonus
meanwhile i didn’t even get half a cup
and he never played before either
i think beginner’s luck very important in cups
all right let’s play one more hand
in in fact look there’s a i wanna give you something
and let me give it too you know before i pawn it for cups money
now i want you to have the big white dog as a kinda of a y’know thank you for being such a great roommate
i can’t take the big white dog
no but wait what if i bought it from you y’know
and your nice gesture would be giving it to me at a reasonable price say 1 500
wait a second i see what you’re trying to do here
you you’re trying to give me money again
when did i try to give you money
you tried to give some charity i said no you dropped it
then we had a nice last night together we had some fun we gambled nobody tried to give anybody any money
now out of the blue you start with the charity thing again
i’m just trying to help you out
i wanna make sure that you’re okay
look chandler you gotta get it out of your head that i can’t take care of myself
look i’m not gonna miss you helping me out with money
the only thing that i’m gonna miss is you
call me when you get there
this is silly i’m gonna see you in a couple of hours
can i ask you a question
what the hell is that dog doing here
i invented the game of cups as a way to give joey money
and now you want that money back
chandler what kind of an idiot do you take me for
i’m sorry you lost your money but i won it fair and square
now if you wanna try to make some of it back i’d be glad to play you for it
but i should warn you i am very good at cups
now i assume the saucer card came up when you played last
hmm let’s see if it comes up this time
